text: The Men's 91 kg event at the 2010 South American Games had its semifinals held on March 24 and the final on March 27. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Julio Castillo Torres |Jeisson Monroy |Rafael Lima Maximiliano Sosa |} ==Results== ==References== *Report 91kg M
title: Boxing at the 2010 South American Games – Men's 91kg
